div.p: LR04 stack and output of the model. ( A) LR04 time series of δ 18O. The yellow circles mark the most rapid deglaciations with δ 18O decrease faster than 1.1 per mil per 20 kyr. ( B) Its wavelet power spectrum. ( C) Model wavelet power spectrum averaged over 10000 model runs. ( D) The same but with zero orbital forcing in the model. ( E) The same but without the stochastic term in the model. Wavelet power is plotted in the logarithmic scale. Morlet wavelets were used via the Aaron O’Leary’s “Wavelets” Python module.
